refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets the default locale value from the INTL global 'default_locale'

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
Object oriented style
Locale
static string getDefault
Procedural style
string locale_get_default
Gets the default locale value. At the PHP initilaization this value is set to 'intl.default_locale' value from php.ini if that value exists or from ICU's function uloc_getDefault().
